name: EnergyPy
long: Supports running reinforcement learning experiments on energy environments.

name: Gym Gazebo
long: A toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms using ROS and Gazebo.

name: Gym Memory
long: Simple 2D reinforcement learning environments to perform memory experiments.

name: GymFC
long: An OpenAI environment for developing aircraft flight control systems using reinforcement learning

name: Hold'em
long: OpenAI Gym No-Limit Texas Hold'em* (NLTH) environment written in Python.

name: OSim-RL
long: Reinforcement learning environments with musculoskeletal model.

name: PyGame
long: Learning environment, mimicking the Arcade Learning Environment interface.

name: PyBullet gym
long: Open-source implementation of the OpenAI Gym MuJoCo environments.

name: Retro
long: Wrapper for video game emulator cores using the Libretro API.

name: Roboschool
long: Open-source software for robot simulation, integrated with OpenAI Gym.

name: Stock Market RL
long: General environment for stock market trading simulation using OpenAI Gym.

name: TextWorld
long: Sandbox for training and testing reinforcement learning (RL) agents on text-based games.

name: VizDoom
long: Doom-based AI Research Platform for Reinforcement Learning from Raw Visual Information.

name: ALife
long: An artificial life environment for testing reinforcement learning algorithms.

name: MAgent
long: MAgent is a research platform for many-agent reinforcement learning.

name: pysc2
long: PySC2 is DeepMind's Python component of the StarCraft II Learning Environment (SC2LE).

name: Project Malmo
long: Project Malmo is a platform for Artificial Intelligence experimentation and research built on top of Minecraft.

name: TorchCraft
long: A bridge between Torch and StarCraft.
